comment: I never believed her story, not for 1 second. She needs to be fired/recast, plain and simple. The studios were quick to "cancel" Johnny after the allegations and I feel that it is only fair to do the same to her in light of the new evidence/circumstances of the case. Her behavior is beyond reprehensible, playing the victim when in fact, she was the abuser. She needs to be held accountable for what she did, otherwise, they're basically saying that it's ok to do this (to further your career). I think Emilia Clarke would be an excellent choice to replace her. Jason and Emilia have a very special bond and great chemistry, both on and off screen. I really hope that they get rid of that vile woman, Amber Turd. Let her be catapulted into oblivion and never be seen again.
